Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Recombinant Viral Vaccine/Vaccinia Vaccine/Recombinant Vaccinia-TRICOM Vaccine/Recombinant Vaccinia-PSA(L155)-TRICOM Vaccine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A recombinant vaccinia virus encoding a modified peptide of the prostate-specific antigen (PSA) with a leucine substitution at position 155, and a TRIad of COstimulatory Molecules (B7-1, ICAM-1 and LFA-3). Vaccination with this viral vaccine may enhance antigen presentation and may activate cytotoxic T-cells against PSA-expressing tumor cells.
